body.name: GROWNSY Bottle Sterilizer and Dryer, Compact Electric Steam Baby Bottle Sterilizer (Esterilizador de Biberones), Bottle Sanitizer for Baby Bottles, Pacifiers, Pump Parts
deliveryMessages: Or fastest delivery Monday, February 19. Order within 20 hrs 23 mins
features: 【Lighten up】Grownsy’s baby bottle sterilizer is smaller than the rest but holds enough daily feeding supplies and get the job done much quicker. Don’t let a slow bulky sanitizer add extra anxiety to your parenting journey.

【Peace of Mind】With Drying function followed automatically after 99.99% steam sterilization, Grownsy’s bottle sanitizer effectively prevents mold from growing inside baby bottles. Build-in filter prevent secondary pollution by exposure to new contamination in the air. Double protection, Twice as much love.

【Stop Waiting】 Tired of endless waiting for air-dry? Go for this Grownsy’s electric sterilizer which features a drying function that’s 31% faster then others! Get more sleep or spend some time on a beauty salon. You will glowing with health and come back with better mood.

【Universal Fit】 All brands/sizes baby bottles, pacifiers, pump parts, tiny spoons, teethers and even the occasional wine glass may all find a room in your bottle sterilizer. It’s a nice baby shower gift for modern new parents

【Use 3 Ways and 4 Functions】Features only large lower bin, only smaller upper bin and both bin together for different occasions; Use as a Sterilizer & Dryer, Sterilizer Only, Dryer Only or Storage System

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: GROWNSY Bottle Sterilizer and Dryer Combine drying function in such small size sanitizer meanwhile remain enough room for bottles and all small parts
With Grownsy, just lighten up, and smile up!
Previous page Step 1. Pour 90ml distilled water Step 2. Press the "ON" button Step 3. Select program use auto option (sterilizer + dryer) or use either separately Next page 1 Step 1 2 Step 2 3 Step 3
Time Saving No more boiling the bottles on the stove and no need to wait for the long dishwasher cycles!

Safe drying Effectively filtrate small particles and hair while drying Easy to clean Wipe the heating plate after cooling, and it's highly recommended to clean with a vinegar and water solution once a week to keep it clean and operating properly

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 4, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Just received this sterilizer/dryer combo and so far it works really well! Sterilizing takes 8 minutes and there are two drying options from 60 to 80 minutes. Every cycle I’ve run has come out dried without having to re-run. This item doesn’t take up a lot of counter space and is a good value.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 28, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars GROWNSY Bottle Sterilizer and Dryer
reviews.reviewText: As a father, this one of my favorite baby gadgets to use. The ease of use and generous capacity that this machine offers is perfect for my family’s needs. With all the products on the market it’s hard to choose the right one for you. We took that chance on this product and we have no regrets. Great build quality for a reasonable price. The entire process is faster than you think between the sterilizing and drying. This machine does offer several settings to accommodate your needs. We did get this on sale during the Black Friday special for $39 but even at full retail I still think it’s worth every penny. We use the machine 2 to 3 times a day. I definitely recommend!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 21, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Easy to Use & Decent Price
reviews.reviewText: Works great! Easy to use, quick cycles & holds a lot.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 30, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I wasn't sure about this product at first, but it's been a few months now and I use it every single day, multiple times a day and love it! Definitely one of the best postpartum purchases that has helped make life easier. I use it for Mam brand bottles, pacifiers, and all of my Momcozy brand breast pump parts. I usually have to use dryer mode twice for the breast pump parts just because a bit of moisture stays in the small ridges of some of the parts. It feels good knowing I'm able to take that extra measure to disinfect these items. I would highly recommend this for any mom!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 5, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Compact and Efficient Bottle Sterilizer and Dryer: Convenient but limited capacity
reviews.reviewText: The Bottle Sterilizer and Dryer, Compact Electric Steam Baby Bottle Sterilizer, has become a reliable companion in my baby care routine. It functions well, effectively sterilizing and drying bottles with ease. The compact size is a great space-saver, but I do wish it had a larger capacity. It can only accommodate four Philips Avent bottles, while it would fit five bottles of Dr. Brown's. However, apart from this limitation, the sterilizer works perfectly. It is user-friendly, with easy controls and hassle-free cleaning. Overall, I recommend the Bottle Sterilizer and Dryer for its excellent performance and convenience, keeping in mind its limited capacity for certain bottle brands.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 3, 2024
reviews.reviewText: This is absolutely the best!! I definitely recommend. I exclusively pump for my little one and this has a dryer setting, sterilizing and a all in one. This definitely is a lifesaver with how many bottles I go through in a day

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 22, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Small but awesome!
reviews.reviewText: I love this sterilizer!! Its so convenient and small and it doesn’t take much space on my countertop! I love it so far! So easy to use! Best purchase ever!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 10, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Best baby purchase
reviews.reviewText: I wasn't going to buy one of these dryer/sterilizers originally because I figured I had a dishwasher which does the same thing however it takes a long time and when I started pumping and needing my pump parts more quickly I decided to buy this when it was on a lightning deal and it's currently the backbone of my home. It dries super quick and fits a decent amount in there. I run it several times a day and I literally would be lost without it.

We bought this sterilizer after our second child …. And this is worth the money and TIME it saves us every single day. I used to sterilize in a pot on the stove ….. I hate that I didn’t buy this sooner with my first!! Can fit 4 large bottles and 4 nipples no problem in one sterilization. Super easy to use and clean. I love that I just put a little water in and close the lid - press a button and leave it. Come back 10 minutes later and the bottles are ready to go! So user and family friendly. If your thinking of buying a sterilizer DO IT!! This one works great - no issues and it’s been 4 months of non stop use!

Llevo 8 meses usándolo, es muy fácil de usar, le caben 5 mamilas de 5 onzas con tapas y chupones, lo único es que sí eres una persona con poco tiempo, tarda 8 minutos o un poco más. y la otra es que le sale sarro en el metal sin importar que agua uses. pero por calidad y precio esta muy bien.
Working perfectly from 2 weeks no hassles just one button operation does all the job

reviews.reviewTitle: Worked for once ( only for 2 mins
reviews.reviewText: Not sure what went wrong.. i gave this as a gift to my sister as she got a newly born baby. Quite disappointing..

reviews.reviewTitle: nothing fancy but works as intended...
reviews.reviewText: Just in case you are not aware, this uses steam to sterilize. It is big enough to fit the 9Oz bottles.I do wash with soap etc before using this. It has an auto-off feature but no timer so to speak. I recommend not just leaving it over night. Reason being it will off it but the steam remains inside, so if you don't remove the cover, then it does not dry easily. It boils the water so the more water you have, the longer it will take to heat. Not a big deal to me, I just put more water to be on the safe side. There's water left after the auto timer is up. I only used it about 3 times now so I have not seen any scale built up but I do also drain the left over water soon after the auto timer is done. just be careful not to burn yourself.
